tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_user_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    user_preferences JSONB,
    user_settings JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE ar_location_data (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);
